name: Youtube Simpleee Hello Kitty Style Hello Kitty
additional_info: This CSS code uses colors instead of images to create a Hello Kitty theme for YouTube. The header background color is white, the logo background color is pink, and the navigation bar background color is also pink. The search bar has a white background with rounded corners and black text. The footer background color is the same as the content background color, and the text in the footer is white. You can customize these colors to your liking by changing the hexadecimal values to match your desired colors. Gears Realm
